summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dream Journal app with new features: Settings page, streak freeze functionality, lucid dream tracking, social sharing, and explore page. Backend APIs working excellently (95.8% success rate). Frontend has authentication session persistence issues affecting user experience.

minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both indicate authentication failure correctly

critical_bugs.issue: JWT tokens expire very quickly causing frequent redirects to login page
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot navigate between pages without being logged out

ui_bugs.issue: Explore page requires authentication but should be public according to backend API
ui_bugs.impact: Public dream discovery feature not accessible

passed_tests: Dream CRUD operations with lucid dream tracking
Public dream access via share links
User statistics with lucid dream count
Shared dream page UI (public access working)

critical_fixes: Fix JWT token expiration - tokens expire too quickly causing session loss
Make /explore route public (no authentication required) to match backend API design
Implement proper session persistence for authenticated routes
medium_priority: Add proper error handling for authentication failures
Ensure Settings page is accessible from user dropdown navigation
Test and verify all data-testid attributes are properly implemented
